content.rendered:
Ayup Squarrites and Squarrettes.  Keep your eyes on your emails for the latest bugle calls and yupdates on doos.

Our forthcoming proposed SQUARRY DOOS are as follows:

July. JJJJ in Crewe

Aug. Stone with Tone. 

Contact me at yuppy@baltibugle.co.uk  if you’re interested in joining us on any of the above.

The following list includes a few other mouth-watering destinations we can include above or for future squarry doos.  Let me have your suggestions and I’ll add them to the list.

Lancaster – starting at the brewery on the station.

A Brolly/Darkside Real Ale experience through realaletrail.co.uk. (either Shropshire in May; the Wirral in June; or Cheshire in October).

A return to the Wirral, Macc, Chester, Bristol, Hereford or Shrewsbury. 

Manchester – Whistle Punks Urban Axe throwing and Albert Schloss’s german beer hall. Crazy Pedro’s with Jacko’s pizzas!!

Colne near Burnley – Tapster’s Promise, Boyce’s Barrel and Cask n Keg.

Bristol

Cardiff – Day out with Moonbeam

Eccleshall

Train to Hereford.

Limestone Caverns Boat Tour with Dudley Canal Trust and Tipton area visit. Ma Pardoes and The Vine Indian/pub at West Brom.

Sheffield (check out Thornbridge’s bar called Dada)

A visit to the Weal Ales brewery,

Morecambe – The Sug micropub at Carnforth

Stockport – including The White Lion at Disley.

Ilkley Brewery visit by Pedro

Spike’s (sorry,, Spice) Exchange Milton

Uttoxeter – Viceroy or Kuh-i-Noor

Rocester – Tasnim

Moments – Meir (see Dasher’s review)

Thornbury Hall – Cheadle
